summary:
A Hand-Crafted player home with plenty of displays for various weapons, armours, and more!
If you like this, don\'t forget to endorse it! :)
descriptionHtml:
Do you have excess amounts of weapons and armours that are just wasting away in chests, and not enabling the world to see them in all their glory? Do you need a new player house that is SPACIOUS and INTERESTING to look at? Then this is the mod for you!

Rahhjorag Tower is a 5 floor player house with several rooms with display cases for shields, swords, daggers, and armour sets! All neatly and decoratively displayed to show the world just how much stuff you have!

The Tower is seperated into 3 tiers: Prestige Tier, Legendary Tier, and Ascended Tier! The higher you go the better stuff you display! Simple right?

In addition to countless displays, the tower also features full living conditions such as: bedroom, kitchen, dining room, lounge, forges and smelters, grindstone and work bench, crafting tables for enchanting and alchemy on every floor, and several chests for housing excess goods!

The Tower is located west of Riften in the fringes of the edge map, it is marked with an Imperial Tower marker.

*-========================-*
Install Notes

-Download file and extract the .rar file 
-Place the .esp file in your DATA folder located inside your skyrim installation directory
-Go into data files on startup and assure the mod is checked off
-Done!
*-========================-*
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*-========================-*
*Uninstall Notes*

-Simply uncheck the .esp in your data files
*-========================-*
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*-========================-*
*Other Notes*
-Remember to endorse this file if you like it! It is much appreciated!
*-========================-*

-Made by hertznca
author: hertznca

files.name: Rahhjorag Tower Update
files.changelogHtml:
Exterior Smoothing and Patchwork on side of Tower
Minor Interior Additions
Teleport Buttons to seperate tiers now available
Tower rooftop access now available

files.name: Rahhjorag Tower Update 2
files.changelogHtml:
Music has been edited for interior to be playing default town music as well as some ambiance changes
Tanning rack was added to Prestige Level in the workbench/grinding stone room
Additional mannequins have been added to the third floor in the shield and weapon plaque rooms
*Teleport Cellar has been added! Now the tower is linked with every other player home in the game with a teleport button system in the cellar (look for trapdoor under the staircase of the first floor) can now teleport to your other player houses and back
Other minor interior edits
